message:
We are looking for a talented and creative web designer to join our web design and development team.
Web design work will include:
Creative website designs which reflect a product/clients brand, images, and other graphics for the websites. Designing layouts, colour schemes, fonts and a combination of text, audio, image and video selection. Converting those designs to Html,css format.
Requires knowledge and experience in the following:
-1-2 Years of Experience
-Adobe Photoshop,Adobe Illustrator
-Html,CSS3, Jquery, Javascript.
Please send your CV and Portfolio to ahmed@logic-designs.com with the subject set as "Web DESIGNER". Please include your Portfolio
